badges.name: Boulder Badge
badges.effect: Increases Attack. Flash can be used outside battle.

badges.name: Cascade Badge
badges.effect: Pokemon up to L30 obey. Cut can be used outside battle.

badges.name: Thunder Badge
badges.effect: Increases Speed. Fly can be used outside battle.

badges.name: Rainbow Badge
badges.effect: Pokemon up to L50 obey. Strength can be used outside battle.

badges.name: Soul Badge
badges.effect: Increases Defense. Surf can be used outside battle.

hmAbilities.name: Cut
hmAbilities.description: Cuts down small trees blocking paths.

hmAbilities.name: Fly
hmAbilities.description: Fly to any previously visited Pokemon Center.

storyEvents.description: Choose your starter Pokemon from Prof. Oak's lab.
Deliver Oak's Parcel and receive the Pokedex.
Pick up Oak's Parcel from the Poke Mart.
Help Bill with his teleporter experiment.
Receive HM01 Cut from the S.S. Anne Captain.
Receive the Bike Voucher from the Pokemon Fan Club.
Defeat Giovanni in the Rocket Hideout to get the Silph Scope.
Rescue Mr. Fuji from Team Rocket in Pokemon Tower.
Receive Tea from the old lady in Celadon Mansion.
Defeat Giovanni at Silph Co. to free the company.
Find HM03 Surf in the Safari Zone secret house.
Return the Gold Teeth to the Safari Zone warden for HM04.
Find the Secret Key in the Pokemon Mansion basement.
The Viridian Gym opens after obtaining 7 badges.
Defeat the Elite Four and Champion to enter the Hall of Fame.

gameProgression: Pallet Town: Get starter from Prof. Oak
Route 1 → Viridian City: Deliver Oak's Parcel
Route 3 → Mt. Moon → Route 4 → Cerulean City
Route 24-25: Meet Bill, get S.S. Ticket
Vermilion Gym: Defeat Lt. Surge (Thunder Badge)
Pokemon Tower: Rescue Mr. Fuji, get Poke Flute
Saffron City → Silph Co.: Defeat Team Rocket
Routes 12-15 or Cycling Road → Fuchsia City
Safari Zone: Get HM03 Surf and HM04 Strength
Elite Four: Lorelei → Bruno → Agatha → Lance → Champion Blue
